nodes.text: Joiol was a planet located in the Orus sector of the Inner Rim that teemed with life.
Around 9 ABY, the smuggler Talon Karrde suspected that Grand Admiral Thrawn's shipments of clones may have been coming through the planet, but later found it was false.
The PC game Star Wars: Rebellion mistakenly places the Orus sector and, consequently, Joiol, in the Outer Rim Territories.
